name: Minecraft HEX Generator (RBG Gradients) ❤️
description: Create stunning HEX gradients for your Minecraft server easily. Supports multiple formats, emojis, lore and MOTD!

name: Minecraft Color Generator (HEX/RGB support)
description: Preview your minecraft colored text and test your messages and announcements! Multiple styles: text, lore, motd and more!

name: SRV Generator 🌎
description: Generate custom DNS and SRV records for Minecraft Java & Bedrock Edition servers. Quick, easy, intuitive, and multi-language.

name: Font Generator ✏️
description: Create stylish texts with unique fonts to class up your content. Minecraft chat, scoreboard, tab, titles, actionbar and hologram compatible!

name: Pixel Art Minecraft Profile Picture Generator 🧚🏻
description: Create cool pixel art minecraft profile pictures with your skin, custom background and custom gradients. No more paying fiverr artists!

name: Minecraft Rank Textures Generator 🎨
description: Create custom textures for your ranks with custom gradients to use with ItemsAdder, Oraxen or Nexo. No more paying fiverr artists for simple ranks!

name: Font Creator 🛠️
description: Create your own pixel fonts easily and import them in our rank texture generator!

name: ChangeOutput Generator 🔁
description: The fastest way to build accurate ChangeOutput placeholders for PlaceholderAPI. Easy, intuitive, and multi-language.

name: Minecraft Renders 🖼️
description: Create cool Minecraft renders with your skin. Many options available. No more paying fiverr artists!

name: Minecraft Skin 3D Viewer 🏃🏻
description: Create cool Minecraft animations with your skin in 3D view. Many options available. No more paying others for your gifs!

name: Block Shape Generator for Builders 👷🏻‍♀️
description: Craft epic Minecraft builds with ease! Generate precise block-by-block guides for domes, spheres, cylinders, and cones. Design perfect shapes now!

name: Config Comparator Updater 🔧
description: Compare configuration files from your plugins and update them easily with the missing options!

name: YAML/JSON Parser ✅
description: Online YAML Parser to validate YAML files!

name: ViaVersion Protocol Generator ⚙️
description: Setup ViaVersion easily and whilelist/blacklist client versions with only 2 clicks!
